mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHOW (SHOW_NUMBER, ARTIST_NUMBER, SHOW_NAME, SHOW_CONTENT, SHOW_DAY, SHOW_TIME , SHOW_ADDRESS, SHOW_LOCATION, SHOW_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_SHOW.NEXTVAL, #{artistNumber}, #{showName}, #{showContent}, #{showDay}, #{showTime}, #{showAddress}, #{showLocation}, #{showType})
mapper.select:
SELECT SHOW_NUMBER, ARTIST_NUMBER, SHOW_NAME, SHOW_CONTENT, SHOW_DAY, SHOW_TIME, SHOW_ADDRESS, SHOW_LOCATION, SHOW_TYPE FROM TBL_SHOW
WHERE SHOW_DAY - SYSDATE > 0
AND SHOW_TYPE = 1
AND SHOW_TYPE = 2
ORDER BY SHOW_DAY ASC

SELECT SHOW_NUMBER, ARTIST_NUMBER, SHOW_NAME, SHOW_CONTENT, SHOW_DAY, SHOW_TIME, SHOW_ADDRESS, SHOW_LOCATION, SHOW_TYPE FROM TBL_SHOW WHERE 0 = TO_DATE(SHOW_DAY,'YY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YY-MM-DD') AND
SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '서울%'
SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '경기%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '인천%'
SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '충남%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '충북%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '세종%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '대전%'
SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '강원%'
SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '전남%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '전북%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '광주%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '경북%'
(SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '경남%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '경북%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '울산%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '대구%' OR SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '부산%')
SHOW_ADDRESS LIKE '제주%'
ORDER BY SHOW_TIME ASC
